name: Keepin' it Arr-live
description:
You are a pirate on an enemy ship and they will try to kill you! How long can you stay out of Davy Jones'Locker, matey?

Controls:
A-D or arrows to move,
Space to jump,
Q to switch between sword and gun,
E or Left mouse button to strike or fire,
Flip your character with your mouse position.

I havent gotten to scene managing, tweaking and finetuning and implemeting all the features I wanted, but my parents told me to stop now, before I get square eyes ;)

Please be gently with rating, it's my first real game 😁

I will likely improve the game and add features like audio and a Menu screen. I had to finish this before adding that because I made it for Ludum Dare 46. Please follow me if you are interested in future updates or other games!

The pirate assets are from 0x72:

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-pirates-tileset
